dialogue: Yes, sir! And I've brought you your two favorite things.
Even better, sir! A cup of coffee and a smile.
I give him a huge grin as he sips his coffee.
[name], did you forget to put milk in this?
Y-yes, sir. I mean, I couldn't find any, and...–
No! I've had enough of your excuses today. This is the last straw – Quincible, I'm going to have to ask you to leave.
No! If I can go the rest of my life without hearing you talk again, I'll die a happy man. Stop talking and get out!
With a sigh, I leave. Emma gives me a sad look as our new boss - well, HER new boss - continues to rail her.
It looks like that'll never be me. If only I'd hassled the boss a little less!
